title: Tea Set
medium: Heat resistant glass, steel and wood
dimensions:
.1a-b (tea kettle and lid): 7 11/16 x 6 7/8" (19.6 x 17.5 cm)
.2a-b (tea pot and lid): 4 1/4 x 4 1/2" (10.8 x 11.4 cm)
.3a-b (sugar bowl and lid): 4 3/16 x 4 1/2" (10.7 x 11.4 cm)
.4-9 (tea cups): 2 x 4 1/2" (5.1 x 11.4 cm)
.10-15 (tea cup saucers): 3/8 x 6" (1 x 15.2 cm)
.16a-b (rum decanter and lid): 3 3/8 x 6 9/16" (8.6 x 16.7 cm)
credits: Gift of George R. Kravis II in honor of Marie-Joseé Kravis
